title: Wild Africa: the energy cycle
creator_credit: James Murray, William Banting and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: This film discusses the flow of energy from green plants through the herbivores and carnivores of the African plains. Various herbivores are shown eating and these in turn are food for carnivores. Concentrates on the flow of food energy. Taken from the orginal production entitled ‘Wild Africa: as it was’.
